item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 10, 2024 Today's Verse Isaiah 40:30â€“31 [30] Even youths shall faint and be weary, and young men shall fall exhausted; [31] but they who wait for the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings like eagles; they shall run and not be weary; they shall walk and not faint. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
